text: The men's 200 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 15 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Andrew Howe ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Leigh Julius ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Jamil James ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July Wind: +0.1 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
